name: Aestred Thurga And Agathae Dolan

unit.name: Auto-Tapestry of the Emperor’s Judgement
unit.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Aestred Thurga model, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability

unit.name: Recount the Deeds of the Saints
unit.description: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Agathae Dolan model, each time that unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice . When that Agathae Dolan model is destroyed , you gain D3 Miracle dice.

composition.description: 1 Aestred Thurga – EPIC HERO 1 Agathae Dolan – EPIC HERO Aestred Thurga is equipped with: bolt pistol; Blade of Vigil. Agathae Dolan is equipped with: bolt pistol; scribe’s staff.

name: Canoness

unit.name: Sacred Command
unit.description: Once per battle round , one unit from your army with this ability can use it when its unit is targeted with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

unit.name: The Emperor’s Grace
unit.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 2+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Null Rod
unit.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks .

unit.name: Rod of Office

unit.name: Holy Judgement
unit.description: At the start of your Shooting phase , select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this unit's Ephrael Stern model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test , subtracting 2 from the result if it is a CHAOS unit. If the test is failed, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds .

name: Saint Celestine

unit.name: Healing Tears
unit.description: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase , if this unit is below its Starting Strength , either one destroyed Geminae Superia model or up to D3 other Bodyguard models are returned to this unit.

unit.name: Lifewards
unit.description: While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

unit.name: Miraculous Intervention
unit.description: The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed , roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

composition.description: 1 Celestine – EPIC HERO 2 Geminae Superia Saint Celestine is equipped with: the Ardent Blade. Each Geminae Superia is equipped with: bolt pistol; power weapon.

unit.description: At the start of the battle round , select up to two of the abilities in the Relics of the Matriarchs section (see left). Until the start of the next battle round, this model has those abilities.

unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a DAEMON unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll .

composition.description: 1 Celestian Sacresant Aveline – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: Ministorum hand flamer; The Thorn of the White Rose.

unit.name: Cherub
unit.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith , you gain 1 Miracle dice .

unit.name: Designer’s Note
unit.description: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

unit.name: Defenders of the Faith
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

unit.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.

composition.description: 1 Sister Superior 9 Battle Sisters Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Purge and Cleanse
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover .

composition.description: 1 Immolator This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; immolation flamers; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Self Repair
unit.description: At the start of your Command phase , this model regains 1 lost wound.

composition.description: 1 Sororitas Rhino This model is equipped with: storm bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Emergency Combat Embarkation
unit.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Charge phase , after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move , you can select one ADEPTA  SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge. Provided that unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and every model in that unit is within 3" of this TRANSPORT , it can embark within this TRANSPORT .

composition.description: 1 Repressor This model is equipped with: Repressor twin heavy flamer; storm bolter; dozer ram.

unit.name: Consecrated Ground
unit.description: When this FORTIFICATION is set up, all parts of it must be set up within 1" of another part. Friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models can be set up or end any type of move on top of the floor sections of this FORTIFICATION . While an ADEPTA  SORORITAS unit from your army is within 1" of this FORTIFICATION , that unit can perform one additional Act of Faith per phase.

unit.name: Holy Cover
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

composition.description: 1 Battle Sanctum This model is equipped with: nothing.

unit.name: Extremis Trigger Word
unit.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can choose to invoke its extremis trigger word. If you do, then until the end of the phase, arco-flails equipped by models in this unit have an Attacks characteristic of 6 and the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

composition.description: 3-10 Arco-flagellants Every model is equipped with: arco-flails.

unit.name: Rites of Castigation
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the turn, each time a friendly ADEPTA  SORORITAS unit makes a ranged attack that targets that enemy unit, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. The same enemy unit can only be affected by this ability once per turn.

composition.description: 1 Castigator This model is equipped with: Castigator autocannons; 3 heavy bolters; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Rituale Nullificatus
unit.description: Models in this unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against Psychic Attacks and mortal wounds .

unit.name: Virtue of Intolerance
unit.description: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army to be this unit’s quarry. Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets its quarry, that attack has the [PRECISION] ability and you can re-roll the Hit roll . This ability can be used even if this unit is embarked within a TRANSPORT .

unit.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.

unit.name: Denuncia Oratory
unit.description: Each time the bearer’s unit’s quarry is destroyed, you can select a new unit from your opponent’s army to be its quarry.

composition.description: 1 Celestian Insidiant Superior 9 Celestian Insidiants Each model is equipped with: condemnor bolt pistol; null mace.

unit.description: While an ADEPTA SORORITAS CHARACTER is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll .

composition.description: 1 Sacresant Superior 4-9 Celestian Sacresants Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; hallowed mace.

unit.name: Cherub
unit.description: Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith , you gain 1 Miracle dice .

unit.name: Designer’s Note
unit.description: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.

unit.name: Righteous Awareness
unit.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".

unit.name: Simulacrum Imperialis
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.

composition.description: 1 Dominion Superior 9 Dominions Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Devastating Refrain
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with an Indirect Fire weapon scored a hit against an enemy unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test . Each time such an attack destroys an enemy model that has the Deadly Demise ability, that model’s Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of 5+ instead of on a 6.

composition.description: 1 Exorcist This model is equipped with: Exorcist missile launcher; heavy bolter; armoured tracks.

unit.name: Anguish of the Unredeemed
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 2+, do not remove it from play; That destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

unit.name: Anchorite Sarcophagus
unit.description: The bearer has a Move characteristic of 7" and a Save characteristic of 3+.

composition.description: 1-2 Mortifiers Every model is equipped with: 2 heavy bolters; twin penitent buzz-blades.

unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll .

composition.description: 1 Paragon Superior 2 Paragons Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; heavy bolter; Paragon storm bolters; Paragon war blade.

composition.description: 1-2 Penitent Engines Every model is equipped with: penitent flamers; twin penitent buzz-blades.

unit.description: While this unit contains a Repentia Superior model, each time a Sisters Repentia model in this unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll .
